title: Season 10, Episode 10: OTAs
content: We're in the thick of the 2018 NFL offseason program as the Los Angeles Rams are midway through organized team activities (OTAs). The optional mandatory minicamp is scheduled June 12-14, and then...we wait.  So join 3k, Seattle Rams and Joey O for another episode of Turf Show Radio.
contentWithMarkup:
